sections.title: I am the Lord your God; you shall not have strange gods before me

questions.text: Have I placed anything or anyone above God in my life?
Have I trusted more in myself or others than in God's will?
Have I neglected daily prayer or time with God?
Have I doubted God's love or plan for my family?
Have I made idols of success, appearance, or control?
Have I failed to teach my children about God?
Have I sought comfort in things more than in the Lord?

sections.title: You shall not take the name of the Lord your God in vain

questions.text: Have I spoken disrespectfully about God or holy things?
Have I used God's name casually or in frustration?
Have I stayed silent when others used God's name disrespectfully?
Have I taken oaths or promises lightly?
Have I prayed without sincerity or focus?
Have I mocked religious practices or sacred things?
Have I allowed media or conversations that misuse God's name?

sections.title: Remember to keep holy the Lord’s Day

questions.text: Have I attended Mass every Sunday unless seriously prevented?
Have I encouraged my family to honor the Lord’s Day?
Have I avoided unnecessary work and focused on rest?
Have I used Sunday as a day of prayer, joy, and family?
Have I treated Sunday as just another busy day?
Have I helped my children understand why Sunday is special?
Have I made time for personal and family worship?

sections.title: Honor your father and your mother

questions.text: Have I spoken respectfully about my parents and in-laws?
Have I been patient and forgiving with family disagreements?
Have I taught my children to honor their elders?
Have I helped care for my aging parents when needed?
Have I let bitterness or unresolved issues linger?
Have I honored the wisdom and sacrifices of my parents?
Have I encouraged my spouse to maintain family peace?
Have I nurtured anger, resentment, or harsh judgment?
Have I spoken hurtful or cutting words to my husband or children?
Have I forgiven others fully and sincerely?
Have I damaged another’s reputation with gossip or criticism?
Have I promoted peace in my home and community?
Have I prayed for enemies or those who offend me?
Have I respected all life from conception to natural death?
Have I been faithful to my husband in thought and action?
Have I entertained inappropriate relationships or fantasies?
Have I upheld the dignity of marriage publicly and privately?
Have I avoided media that tempts impurity or lust?
Have I respected intimacy as a sacred gift?
Have I cultivated emotional purity in friendships?
Have I supported others in living a chaste married life?
Have I taken anything that does not belong to me?
Have I been honest with finances in the family and community?
Have I misused resources or wasted time?
Have I taught my children about honesty and stewardship?
Have I given my fair share to Church and charity?
Have I failed to return borrowed items or repay debts?
Have I respected my spouse's and others’ property?

sections.title: You shall not bear false witness against your neighbor

questions.text: Have I lied or misled my spouse or others?
Have I gossiped or spoken negatively about others?
Have I judged others without full understanding?
Have I protected the dignity of others in speech?
Have I taught my children the value of honesty?
Have I respected others’ privacy?
Have I sought truth and reconciliation in conflict?

sections.title: You shall not covet your neighbor’s wife

questions.text: Have I desired someone else’s relationship or affection?
Have I compared my marriage to others with jealousy?
Have I nurtured emotional or romantic fantasies about others?
Have I been grateful for my husband’s love and presence?
Have I supported other women in their vocations and marriages?
Have I guarded my heart from discontent or romanticism?
Have I turned to God to fulfill my emotional needs?

sections.title: You shall not covet your neighbor’s goods

questions.text: Have I envied others’ homes, clothes, vacations, or possessions?
Have I pressured my family for more than we need?
Have I been wasteful or greedy?
Have I forgotten to be content with what God has given us?
Have I placed too much value on material things?
Have I modeled gratitude over desire in front of my children?
Have I rejoiced in others' blessings without envy?
